metadata.title: CVE-2021-30184 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: GNU Chess 6.2.7 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted PGN (Portable Game Notation) data. This is related to a buffer overflow in the use of a .tmp.epd temporary file in the cmd_pgnload and cmd_pgnreplay functions in frontend/cmd.cc.

criterions.comment: gnuchess package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
